name: Galactic Ascendancy
description:
Galactic Ascendancy is an immersive 2.5D experience that is set in the vast expanse of the Andromeda Galaxy, players will embark on an epic journey to invade and conquer that world.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Destroy enemy fighters and clear the way for the transport ships.
  • Collect different powerups to increase your chances of success.
  • Collect residue from destroyed enemies to boost your ship's defensive capabilities.

EXPLORE A RICH UNIVERSE:

Dive into a meticulously crafted universe filled with different worlds and enemies. Encounter diverse alien civilizations, and unite the galaxies under one banner.

EPIC SPACE BATTLES:

Engage in intense space battles as you lead your fleet to conquer the Andromeda Galaxy. Witness the grand scale of interstellar warfare.

CONQUER THE GALAXY:

Take on the role of Admiral Preen, a skilled and ambitious strategist and military leader entrusted with a flagship in the human fleet, whose mission is to lead the attack on these creatures. Experience the consequences of war as you strive to fulfill the emperor's vision of galactic conquest.
